# Mantle of Chaos (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Chaotic Spells|chaotic]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Limbo (Domain)|Limbo]] 3

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 137

*You invoke the powers of chaos, and a flickering yellow field of anarchic energy surrounds you.*

The power of this spell grants you spell resistance equal to 12 + your caster level against spells with the [[Lawful Spells|lawful]] descriptor.
